attributes.action: urge the United Nations to establish a Commission of Inquiry into war crimes and crimes against humanity being committed by the dictatorship in Burma
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British Prime Minister Gordon Brown has led the world in supporting Burma's democracy movement, but the British government has still not supported the United Nations establishing a commission of inquiry into the war crimes and crimes against humanity, mainly against ethnic groups, committed by the dictatorship in Burma. These include systematic rape, targeting of civilians, slave labour, and the destruction of more than 3,300 villages. The British government must end its silence on the crimes against humanity in Burma.
